title: Roast whole suckling pig with truffle mousse, Jersey Royals and wild garlic
description: This succulent pork and potatoes dish is served with a truffle cream mousse that will require you to get those kitchen gadgets out of the cupboard.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a blender or a Thermomix, a gas canister gun and a large roasting tin.
ingredients: 300ml/10½fl oz beef jus (or good-quality beef stock)
600ml/20fl oz double cream, plus 2 tbsp to serve
salt and freshly ground black pepper
250g/9oz thumbnail-sized Jersey Royals, just given a little scrape
